questions.question: What is $142 - 58$?
questions.hint: You'll need to borrow twice here. Start from the ones place and work left.

questions.question: What is $305 - 167$?
questions.hint: When the tens digit is 0, you'll need to borrow from the hundreds first.

questions.question: What is $423 - 186$?
questions.hint: Borrow from tens for the ones, then from hundreds for the tens.
